questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Senliten. (Chat 2•3•✓)
itemsNeeded: Any morph of Cat or Kitten
additionalStepInformation: Inside the pyramid east of fairy ring code DLQ
North-east of Nardah which is easily reached by using Desert amulet 2 or above.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head to Sophanem and talk to Jex north of the Sphinx. (Chat 2•4•1•2•3)
additionalStepInformation: If players have completed Contact!, players can right click on Coenus by the bridge to pass through to Sophanem.
To quickly enter the magic carpet network, use a charged amulet of glory and teleport to Al Kharid, or use a Desert amulet 2 to teleport to Nardah.

questSteps.stepDescription: Drop the cat and talk to the Sphinx (Chat 2•3•4)
Go back and talk to Senliten. (Chat 2).
Head to Ape Atoll and equip the monkey greegree and monkeyspeak amulet, then speak to three wise monkeys in the The Temple of Marimbo (north-easternmost temple). (Chat 1•1)
Fill your inventory with Green bananas from the crate to the east and lay a trail to lure the guard to the crate.
additionalStepInformation: you can place bananas every few squares to ensure the guard does not give up.
Key-binding the Green banana will make this step easier, look in images for the path taken

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to the three wise monkeys and talk to them. Then remove your greegree and speak to them in human form, then equip your greegree and speak to them again. (Chat 2•4)
Talk to King Awowogei in the building south of the temple (Chat 1•5•3)
additionalStepInformation: If you dont already have a mould Hamab's crafting stall sells a Monkeyspeak amulet mould which is needed later in the quest.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Rokuh in Nardah next to the fountain. (Chat 1•1•2)
itemsNeeded: or Ice Barrage. Higher level spells
additionalStepInformation: You should receive one chimp ice.
If not or it melts, right click on Rokuh to buy another.
Click and choose spell your using to freeze it temporarily again.
Unlike standard ancient spell casting, you do not need a staff for this. Only the runes are enough.

questSteps.stepDescription: Take the chimp ice to King Awowogei without teleporting. Look in Additional Information for Routes.
additionalStepInformation: Fastest Route - This route requires having unlocked the balloon transport system to the Tree Gnome Stronghold, which requires the completion of Enlightened Journey.
The route must be unlocked from Entrana, using 3 magic logs per attempt, after which each use of the route will cost 1 magic logs.
1.) Use Magic Carpet to Alkharid
2.) North-West to Fremennik Ship to Daemonheim
3.) Boat from Daemonheim to Taverly and get on the balloon to Grand Tree
4.) Climb up the ladder to the bar and Right-Click Daero.
5.) Right-Click Waydar ( Travel, Yes )
6.) Right-Click Lumbdo ( Travel )
7.) Run to the gate get attacked, lockpick your way out, run past the guards then re-equip your greegree
8.) Run south-east and talk to guard then talk to the king.
This Begins the Second Fastest Mode of Transportation: Eagle Transport - Rope is required.
1.) From Nardah use the magic carpet to travel to Uzer.
2.) Run North to the desert eagle lair located north of the yellow salamanders
3.) Use rope on eagle and travel to Eagles Peak and exist the cave.
4.) Run along the fence and through the terrorbird pen to the Grand Tree to the north.
5.) Climb-Up and go to the bar Right-Click Daero ( Travel )
6.) Right-Click Waydar ( Travel, Yes )
7.) Right-Click Lumdo ( Travel )
8.) Run to the gate, get attacked, lockpick the door, run past the guards, Greegree on and run south-east to the guard talk to the guard and speak to the king.
Third Fastest - Slowest - Charter Ship - Requires Resting
1.) From Nardah travel to Alkharid go through the pass and talk to shantay.
2.) Choose "What is this place?" and "I am definitely an outlaw, prepare to die!", and "Deport me to Port Sarim".
3.) Pick the Lock and Charter Ship to Catherby and Run all the way to the Grand Tree. Rest at Musicians by the fishing guild along the way. Remember to when resting open the world map.
4.) Climb-Up and go to the bar Right-Click Daero ( Travel )
5.) Right-Click Waydar ( Travel, Yes )
6.) Right-Click Lumdo ( Travel )
7.) Run to the gate, get attacked, lockpick the door, run past the guards, Greegree on and run south-east to the guard talk to the guard and speak to the king.

questSteps.stepDescription: Go to the wise monkeys and add them to the barrel.
Teleport to Bandit Camp in the Kharidian Desert
additionalStepInformation: If you have a gembag and wear the desert clothing set below you can bring the items from the next section to avoid bank travel.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head north-west around the cliff to the area shown in Images and release the monkeys (open the barrel).
Equip Monkey Speak Amulet and talk to one of the Wise Monkeys.
With your ring of charos (a) equipped, speak to Ali Morrisane north of the Al Kharid lodestone. (Chat 2)
Unequip your Ava's accumulator if you're wearing it. Take the crate to Ava in Draynor Manor. (Chat 5)
Pick up the spade in the easternmost room if you do not already have one.
Go to the fountain in the south-western corner of the manor's grounds.

Wear your Ava's alerter and walk two steps east from the dead tree that can be converted to a hidey-hole, just north-east of the fountain. Dig when it says Bwuk! Bwuk! Bwuk! Bwuk! (Location is in images)
Return to Ava. (Chat 5)
Teleport to Bandit Camp and in the area north-east of the monkey camp search for crates using the map pictured at this step.
additionalStepInformation: You should dig up 5 crates, repeat this until you receive bundle of carpets.
If you obtain any uncut gems or noted waterskins, save them for the next step.
If you discover a scarab, kill it and then dig again.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the three wise monkeys twice for a book.
Read the book or at least open it.
Remove the rubble from the four building spots in the colony.
itemsNeeded: 6 teak planks (protean planks and planks stored in the plank box will not work)
1 uncut diamond (gems are obtained during quest)
additionalStepInformation: The desert equipment
knives and waterskins can be bought at the Bandit Camp general store nearby.

questSteps.stepDescription: Build on the 4 plots using your supplies.
Stock the stalls.
Careful not to stock a stall twice - each one needs to be stocked with one set of items.
Talk to the wise monkeys.
Talk to them again. (Chat 2)
Head back to Ape Atoll and find the building with the monkey knife fighters. Punch and pickpocket the monkey fighters for 6 knives.
itemsNeeded: gorilla greegree a ninja monkey greegree (small) if using the fairy ring
additionalStepInformation: Monkey Knife Fighters are located just east of the building with the Monkey Child.
The success rate is fairly low so be prepared to punch at least 30 monkeys.

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to the three wise monkeys and hand the knives over.
Talk to the monkeys again.
Return to the pyramid south of the Ruins of Uzer, east of DLQ, and click the door for a cutscene.
Enter the pyramid and speak to Senliten. (Chat 2•~)
Teleport to Bandit Camp and head back to the colony.
Investigate a corpse to make a ghost monkey appear.
Try to talk to the ghost monkey.
Use one of the amulets on the other to create a cramulet.
Talk to the ghost monkey. (Chat 3)
Enter the well in the middle of Pollnivneach, pass through the large red barrier to the north (Chat 2).

Kill Leeuni (50,000 life points). 
After defeating Leeuni, talk to Iwazaru.
Return to the monkey colony and speak to the ghost monkey again to unlock the next boss.
Kill Ayuni (50,000 life points), who is accessed through a tunnel north of the Kalphite Queen within the Kalphite Hive (not the Exiled Kalphite Hive).
itemsNeeded: 2 Ropes if you havent entered the Kalphite Queens Lair
additionalStepInformation: The Kalphite Queen can be avoided if you set up a custom encounter, as her spawn will be delayed initially. Use practice mode to avoid paying.

questSteps.stepDescription: After the battle, talk to Mizaru. Leave through the east exit to unlock a shortcut or get transported (Chat 5).
Return to the monkey colony and speak to the ghost monkey again to unlock the next boss.
additionalStepInformation: Eruni hits much harder than the other two. Although he has lower defence. Be prepared for an intense fight. Protection prayers and high-healing food strongly recommended.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head to the ruins of Uzer, down the steps and through the door to the north into the demonic realm. After defeating Eruni, speak to Kikazaru, who will take you to the colony.
additionalStepInformation: Eruni will be invincible whenever she summons lesser demons; they must be killed immediately to then deal damage to her.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to the three wise monkeys at the colony - Apmeken will appear and speak to you. (Chat 2)
Return to Senliten. (Chat 2)
Quest complete!

questDetails.StartPoint: Speak with Leela and Senliten in Senliten's tomb.
Requirements: Recipe for Disaster: Freeing King Awowogei
Recipe for Disaster: Another Cook's Quest
Fully restore Senliten from the 'Missing My Mummy' Quest (100%)
ItemsRequired: Any type of cat, kitten, or hellcat
Enough runes for 20+ casts of ice spells
Recommended: Waterskins or an enchanted water tiara
TokKul-Zo and a ninja monkey greegree (small)
